newsitem.title: USA: Wilmington Trust silver stocks 58.2 mln ounces.
newsitem.headline: Wilmington Trust silver stocks 58.2 mln ounces.

text.p: Wilmington Trust deliverable silver stocks fell 560,986 ounces to 58,223,976 ounces in the week ended Oct 21, COMEX division of New York Mercantile Exchange said Tuesday.
Wilmington Trust in Delaware becomes an official exchange silver depositary from Jan 1, 1997.
COMEX silver warehouse stocks, excluding Wilmington Trust silver stocks, rose 175,836 ounces Monday to 131,289,595 ounces, after falling to 10-year lows last week.
NYMEX will report Wilmington Trust data weekly until Jan 2, 1997, when Wilmington's eligible and registered silver stocks will be reported in the exchange's daily metal warehouse data.
Historical data on Wilmington Trust's 1,000 ounce silver bars eligible for COMEX delivery are as follows:
